query: Where is my order?
response: Your order is on its way! You can track it using the tracking number sent to your email.

query: I want to return my product.
response: Please visit the returns page to initiate a return.

query: What is your return policy?
response: We offer 30-day returns on most items. Please visit our returns page for details.

query: How do I track my package?
response: You can track your order using the tracking number sent to your email.

query: Do you offer international shipping?
response: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries worldwide.

query: What payment methods do you accept?
response: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

query: How long does shipping take?
response: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping takes 2-3 days.

query: Can I change my order after placing it?
response: Please contact our support team immediately if you need to modify your order.

query: What is your warranty policy?
response: Most items come with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty.

query: How do I use a discount code?
response: Enter your code at checkout in the promo code field.

query: Are your products authentic?
response: Yes, all products are 100% authentic and sourced directly from manufacturers.

query: Do you have a loyalty program?
response: Yes, join our rewards program to earn points on every purchase.

query: What should I do if my item arrives damaged?
response: Please contact us with photos, and we'll send a replacement immediately.

query: How can I contact customer support?
response: Email us at support@company.com or call 1-800-SUPPORT.

query: Do you offer gift wrapping?
response: Yes, gift wrapping is available for a small fee at checkout.

query: Can I return items without a receipt?
response: We can process returns with your order number from your email confirmation.

query: What brands do you carry?
response: We stock over 500 brands including Nike, Apple, Samsung, and more.

query: Is my personal information secure?
response: We use 256-bit encryption to protect all your data.

query: How do I reset my password?
response: Click Forgot Password" on the login page and follow the instructions."

query: Do you price match?
response: Yes, we match prices from authorized retailers.

query: When will I receive my refund?
response: Refunds are processed within 5-10 business days after return approval.

query: Can I use multiple discount codes?
response: No, only one promo code per order.

query: What is your shipping cost?
response: Shipping costs vary by location. You can see the cost at checkout.

query: Do you sell gift cards?
response: Yes, digital and physical gift cards are available.

query: How do I check my order status?
response: Log into your account and go to Order History" to view all details."

query: Are there any upcoming sales?
response: Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive deals and sale announcements.

query: What is your exchange policy?
response: We offer free exchanges within 30 days of purchase.

query: Do you have a physical store?
response: We currently operate online only, but check back for store locations.

query: How do I report a problem with my order?
response: Contact our customer service team with your order number and details.

query: Can I schedule a delivery time?
response: Delivery times vary by location. Some areas offer specific delivery windows.

query: What happens if an item is out of stock?
response: We'll notify you and offer alternatives or a full refund.

query: Do you offer student discounts?
response: Yes, students get 15% off with valid student ID verification.

query: How long is the checkout process?
response: Most customers complete checkout in under 2 minutes.

query: What is your privacy policy?
response: Visit our website footer to review our complete privacy policy.

query: Can I buy in bulk?
response: Yes, contact our bulk sales team for special pricing.

query: Do you accept returns on sale items?
response: Yes, sale items can be returned within the standard 30-day period.

query: How do I update my shipping address?
response: Contact support before your order ships to request an address change.

query: What is your best-selling product?
response: Our top seller is the Premium Wireless Headphones. Check them out!

query: Do you offer same-day delivery?
response: Same-day delivery is available in select areas. Check if you qualify at checkout.

query: Can I cancel my order?
response: You can cancel orders within 1 hour of purchase. Contact support for assistance.
